briefTitle: Evaluation of Coronary Luminal Diameter Enlargement With Emerge™ 1.20 mm PTCA Dilatation Catheter
officialTitle: EMERGE: Evaluation of Coronary Luminal Diameter Enlargement With Emerge™ 1.20 mm Percutaneous Transluminal Coronary Angioplasty (PTCA) Dilatation Catheter
summary: To evaluate the acute safety and device procedural success of the Emerge 1.20 mm PTCA dilatation catheter when used as a pre-dilatation device in the stenotic portion of coronary arteries or bypass grafts.
